My liege, there are rumours that [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has gathered together a massive army of soldiers, mercenaries and loyalists and is ready to stake a claim on the world

My liege, a sect of priests have been spreading word that [Root.GetTitledFirstName] is the true emperor of the cathlolic faith and carries the true word of god. A massive army of people from neighbouring lands are converging to give [Root.GetTitledFirstName] their blessing and support

My liege, what a site to behold as many thousands of hordes from many great clans from the far east have made a blood pact with [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. They will help unite the clans in the aim to create a new great empire.
My liege, there is word that [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has united a number of major tribes and is willing to expand [GetHerHis] lands to create a great tribe.

My liege, coin has been traded, women married and land promised, we have word that [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has gathered together an army of knights and ordinary folk. It seems he is not content to sit idle while there are lands that are ripe for the taking.
My liege, the foul heresy surrounding [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has attracted a large number of like minded soldiers and loyalists. It could be the signs of a major religious expansion drive.

My leige, troubling news a great army of mercenaries have been brought by [Root.GetTitledFirstName] in the many thousands. It seems [GetSheHe] wishes to expand the republic into a great new nation and showing the world money really does buy everything.

My liege, the shamans of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] are preparing for war, claiming it is time to bring there ruler and people into a new age of prosperity. They could be of great trouble in the future.
A new great power arises
All hail our glorious leader
Troubling indeed...
